description:
When it comes to uniqueness, BLACKPINK's hammer lightstick or 'BI-Ping-Bong' is definitely one of the top contenders. 
Content + Care:
-Light Mode: On, Blink, Flicker, Off
-Maximum Operation: 5 Hours
-Power: 3AAA Batteries
-Weight: 1.5lbs /680g
-Concert light syncing feature / Changes color
The official EXO light stick (Version 3.0) can be connected to your smartphone via Bluetooth 4.0.

Candy Bong is Twice's official light stick. The idea of the 'Candy Bong' was inspired from one of Twice's tracks 'Candy Boy' from their debut mini-album 'The Story Begins'. 
Content + Care:
-Light Mode: On, Blink, Flicker, Off
-Maximum Operation: 5 Hours
-Power: 3AAA Batteries
-Weight: 1.5lbs /680g
-Concert light syncing feature / Changes color

Light Stick For KPOP BTS ARMY Bomb Bangtan Boys Ver.3 Concert Lamp Lightstick
Specification:
Material: Plastic
Power: 3x AAA batteries NOT included
Size: approx.98x224mm

Red Velvet Lightstick has a cupcake shape and features the classic RV logo.
Red Velvet is the first SM girl group to get an official lightstick.
Light Mode : On, Blink, Flicker, Off
Maximum Operation: 4 hours
Power: 3AAA Batteries
Weight: 1.5lbs / 680g
Concert light syncing feature / change color
Connects via Bluetooth with a smartphone

NCT lightstick has a square shape and features iconic logo. It lits up in neon green. This lightstick can create an unforgettable atmosphere on your next NCT concert.
Content + Care:
-Light Mode: On, Blink, Flicker, Off
-Maximum Operation: 5 Hours
-Power: 3AAA Batteries
-Weight: 1.5lbs /680g
-Concert light syncing feature / Changes color
